SEO_DESCRIPTION: Frontend Web Developer with experience in technologies such as React, NextJS, Astro, TailwindCSS, among others.

HERO.SUBTITLE: Web Developer
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Systems Engineering student at UNSA, Peru. Innovative and detail-oriented. Enthusiastic about starting new projects and facing challenges.

ACM.TITLE: ACM UNSA - Student Chapter
ACM.DESCRIPTION: Landing with information about the Student Chapter of the ACM at its UNSA headquarters. Developed from scratch and open source in a team of two.

EXOPLANETS.TITLE: Exoplanets
EXOPLANETS.DESCRIPTION: Desktop application that simulates space from an exoplanet. Developed in a team. I was in charge of the front-end design and implementation and the integration of the NASA API into the interface.

KNOWLEDGE_WARDENS.TITLE: Knowledge Wardens
KNOWLEDGE_WARDENS.DESCRIPTION: Educational platform for teaching programming and technology. Developed in a team for the Midudev hackathon sponsored by vercel. I was in charge of the implementation of the interface and a bit of design. Also the integration of the game in the web application.

TECHART.TITLE: Techart Pixel Canvas
TECHART.DESCRIPTION: Web page developed for the Techart event where each registered user can paint a certain number of pixels on a board for a given time.

CLASSROOM.TITLE: Sustainable Classrooms
CLASSROOM.DESCRIPTION: Virtual platform for classroom management. Developed for the IEEE competition. An optimal performance with few resources was sought.

ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hello, my name is Luis Gustavo. I am a web developer focused on the front-end and a student of Systems Engineering at the National University of San Agust√≠n de Arequipa, in Peru. I like innovating and improving the work I do. I strive to do them well at every stage of development. I enjoy teamwork, I observe and learn the positive aspects of each person and project to improve my practices. Faced with challenges, I investigate, analyze, ask for help and seek solutions proactively.
